title: HOF graded sale - pre Shriners (Boston) show preview
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: HOF graded sale - pre Shriners (Boston) show preview
posts.post_content:
As I’ve just posted others in the T20, six BST section, I am looking forward to sharing a table with the hobby good guy from the local market here, Paul Borges.

I have some nice pre-war cards available for sale that I plan to bring to the Shriner show but wanted to preview here in case anyone would like to get a jumpstart on any of these.

I have individual card scan images for any that may be of interest, so please feel free to inquire.

Payment is by PayPal, please and $10 to ship per order 

Thx all

Jeff
